lines.text: That was the night that I died, and someone else was saved. Someone who was afraid of water, but learned to swim. Someone who knew there would be one moment, where he wouldn't be watching. Someone who knew that the darkness of the broken lights would show the way.

[on phone, with gun aimed at Martin]
Come quickly. I've just killed an intruder.
You sneaked off inexplicably, need I remind you how I worried?
No. You reminded me enough the night I came back.
You're not suggesting I enjoyed that?
God, no. That would make you a monster.
I can't live without you. And I won't let you live without me.
